title: Bug 4971 - Strange 'copy package'
description: When performing the 'copy package' operation in the Eclipse IDE, a strange behavior occurs.
OB: The expected package is not being copied to the selected destination.
EB: The 'copy package' operation should copy the selected package to the desired destination without any issues.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new project in Eclipse.
2. Open the Package viewer.
3. Select a package within the project (e.g., from the context menu).
4. Choose the 'copy' option from the context menu.
5. Verify that the package is not copied to the intended destination.
